title: Analysis of Removal Mechanism on Oxide CMP using Mixed Abrasive Slurry

samples.experiment_context: CMP of SiO2 using D30 slurry at 100 g/cm^2 pressure, 60 rpm velocity, and 30 wt% concentration (assumed concentration based on MAS experiments). Data from Fig 3.

cmp_process.pad_composition: IC1000/SubaIV stacked pad (Nitta Haas Inc., Japan)

characterization.particle_size_measurement_method: Particle size analyzer (ELS-Z, Otsuka Electronics Co.)
